treatment.description: Stems sprawling to erect. Leaves petiolate; blades lanceolate, 50–120 × 6–20 mm, abaxially lanate, adaxially loosely tomentose. Peduncles 15–35 mm. Phyllaries 10–14, linear, 9–10 mm. Florets 13–26; corollas yellow, 11–12 mm. Cypselae 5–6 mm, 12–15-nerved, glabrous; pappi of ca. 125 bristles 10–11 mm.
